title: Gcrypto786
author: Gcrypto786
content: Recently I have seen a BNB address holding most of the BNB (152,145,499.780324509097520763 BNB) and after exploring the address, I have seen that many users have lost their funds and they comment to send it back, but there was no response from the address holder.Did you guys have any information regarding: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001004

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: Gcrypto786 on February 09, 2023, 02:05:30 PMDid you guys have any information regarding: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001004Nothing mysterious is BNB TokenHub used for cross chain https://docs.bnbchain.org/docs/learn/system-contract/Quote from: Gcrypto786 on February 09, 2023, 02:05:30 PMI have seen that many users have lost their funds and they comment to send it back, but there was no response from the address holder.They should contact Binance not post comments on a website.

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: Gcrypto786 on February 09, 2023, 02:05:30 PMRecently I have seen a BNB address holding most of the BNB (152,145,499.780324509097520763 BNB) and after exploring the address, I have seen that many users have lost their funds and they comment to send it back, but there was no response from the address holder.Did you guys have any information regarding: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001004Cannot send coins to smart contract addressThere were many such cases, but in this situation, CZ helped the traderhttps://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1304700593441632257?Even in the explorer it says that this is TokenHub.But you are right in thinking that BNB tokens are not much different from FTX tokens. The binance ecosystem is convenient with small fees, but it depends on the binance exchange.
